verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Blessed Be
Blessed Be
Blessed Be Your Name (2x)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You, Oh Lord, are a strong and
mighty tower
an ever present help
in my darkest hour
You're my hiding place,
You're the ancient of days.
You're the rock on which I'm
standing,
You are worthy of my praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You, Oh Lord, are the deep that I
have searched for.
The ever flowing fountain that
my heart always thirst for.
You're The One that makes me
whole,
You're The Lover of my soul,
And whatever comes my way,
I know You're in control

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Let your people proclaim
You are Holy
You are Holy God
And we lift up Your Name
And give glory
Glory to Your Name
